website_summaries.verdict: A wonder oil in some sense as it not only improves skin and hair, but can enhance culinary endeavors as well.
pros: Noted for its ability to deeply penetrate both skin and hair, providing an organic treatment that can stimulate growth and rejuvenation
We love that it can be mixed with other oils and ingredients for customized benefits
cons: Customers note the bottle could material be thicker to provide more protection

customer_reviews.title: Will make your skin glow!
customer_reviews.text: i mix this with rose hip oil and argan oil from my face to my feet. it TOTALLY makes a difference in your skin! i have really noticed a difference in my face. it will make you oily at first but after you use it a while, your oil production will slow down and you will hardly create any oil. your body gets the message that you're already getting oil! i leave it on pretty thick when i go to bed. leaves oil stain on pillow but worth it. i mix equal parts of the 3 together. try it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing find from Sky Organiics
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing find from Sky Organiics! This oil is just right for my face. I've been using it daily. My skin is usually so sensitive that it breaks out from EVERYTHING, but was also so itchy. Tried La Mer, La Prarie- I'm willing spend the $$$$ but why??? Grape seed oil from Sky Organics beats them all . I keep mine in the refrigerator , use a few drops and my skin is hydrated and not ittated . Great, great product .
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: I was leery on how this product would work. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was leery on how this product would work. I needed something that would make my skin smooth on my face and reduce the redness and skin damage. I've only been utilizing this product for 2 days and notice a huge difference! My skin is actually smooth and the redness has been reduced! Pleasantly surprised and will be purchasing again! 💖
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tripi

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is excellent for oil cleansing. My skin has never been so calm and radiant after using it. I haven't had any big zits or breakouts since I started using it. When you wipe it off with a steamy towel, a little oil still remains on the skin, but somehow, it still sits nicely under makeup and doesn't break down or eat my foundation, yet still cleanses it off when I intentionally remove my makeup. Also, the pump is so handy. I will be buying this again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: My Tendies REEEEE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for my dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for my dry skin! I apply this every night and every morning whether I'm about to apply makeup or not. It's perfect for under makeup as it gives me that dewy look I desire. I also apply a few drops to my beauty blender when i blend out my foundation and I feel like a glowing healthy goddess. When I'm not wearing makeup, I deeply moisturize this on my face, apply moisturizer and I'm ready to go. I haven't gotten this many compliments without makeup in ages. I feel so beautiful, healthy and radiant! Absolutely perfection for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT as advertised on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive product information. Description indicates "cold pressed." ZERO mention of this on product label.
customer_reviews.author: TrishinTennessee

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect massage oil, the pump makes for easy application. It normally takes me some real work to make my girlfriend fall asleep during a massage, but this oil makes it easy. I've used lotions in the past and baby oil, but grapeseed oil is clearly the way to go. Its natural, so after the massage it can be used as lube for "other fun" things in the bed room. Really makes my hands and her skin soft and moisturized. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Need improved Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened this oil yet. But the day it came it was in the high 90's, the envelope, and the bottle were HOT!!! Heat is very bad for oil. This manufacturer needs to better insulate the product. I'm halfway afraid to use it....[sigh]
customer_reviews.author: Katee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pump Dispenser Too Long
customer_reviews.text: Well - I must have misread the description because I was expecting a 16 oz bottle not 8 oz. But that’s my fault not the companies. The reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 is because I have to cut the pump dispenser since it is too long for the 8 oz bottle, plus had I known that 8 oz cost $11.95 I wouldn’t have bought it. I’m trying to save money on carrier oils not over extend my budget. But I guess it’s a better price than Edens Garden where I usually get my carrier oils so I’ll give you that.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Greene

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by grapeseed oil; for a long time I only used coconut oil for my body and face; but I find that grapeseed oil moisturizes and absorbs into your skin and coconut oil is a little less dense (great for my hair though). Grapeseed oil is the perfect density, it’s not too heavy but not too thin. My skin feels amazing and I haven’t any any issues with dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Alternative for those who hate the Coconut Oil smell
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make roller oils and also used it in cooking. The bottle is really full! I made a mistake by when i removed the cap to replace it with the dispenser, it overflowed the precious oil. This is the best oil to use if you do not like the coconut oil smell
customer_reviews.author: redgbee

customer_reviews.title: NOT Organic - Extremely Misleading Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Check out the label on the bottle I received... It's different than the label shown online. In very small print, "not an organic product," although everything else on the bottle suggests that it is, including the brand name, "Sky Organics." Shady and misleading advertising practices deserve 1 star, always.
customer_reviews.author: Linus

customer_reviews.title: Pump lid spills
customer_reviews.text: When using the pump lid the slightest squeeze of the bottle, laying it Dien it flipping it over causes the oil to come out! The product inside is wonderful. Just be careful with the pump lid
customer_reviews.author: Mary and Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great as an oil cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a cleansing oil. I follow it up with a water-based cleanser. I got this as a replacement for my Julep cleansing oil, which is 4x more expensive. It's very light and doesn't leave a residue. I have SUPER oily skin, but this stuff doesn't scare me off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, especially for those who have been continuously searching ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face. I have struggled to find a product that helps with breakouts. I have tried for as long as I can remember. I have not broken out since I have gotten this product, which has been over a month now. Highly recommend, especially for those who have been continuously searching for that product to help with breakouts. Give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kahele

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this oil
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this oil!!! I use it on my face every morning and it has brightened my face and evened out my skin tone! I feel more comfortable leaving the house without make up thanks to this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this product went above and beyond my expectations. I love that it is organic, and there are so many uses! I bought it for a massage oil and it works perfectly. It says it can also be used on the hair, which I'll try next :) I'll update when I do! She even sent an e-book with diy recipes to try! How cool!
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is pretty light which i like since it makes absorption much easier and allows your hands to glide better than some other oils I've used. This oil mixes in essential oils (sold separately) near seamlessly and has no scent so it doesn't compete with the additives I like to use. It is cold pressed so there is no risk of left over chemicals (although chemically extracted version are suppose to leave little to no left over traces) in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jessee

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had a bad reaction to the massage oil my therapist used. Since then I’ve been using it daily because of dry skin in sub freezing temperatures. It has no fragrance and absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna Minton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, great value!!! This is my second purchase of this product from this supplier and I intend to buy many, many more times. I highly recommend this product and this seller!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product that I first began using on my hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that I first began using on my hair. It is so lightweight and absorbs quickly leaving my hair very soft and moisturized. I have also begun using on my face as it is so lightweight and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality of oils
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality of oils! I have purchased several from this seller and I have never been disappointed. I did travel with them about a month ago and they leaked everywhere but I can deal with that because they are so amazing. Great for oil cleansing your face
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: This is really great for my boyfriends SUPER sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for my boyfriends SUPER sensitive skin. He says it helps with his breakouts too! The only problem is the pump that comes with it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: This oil has multi purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the oilfor my skin hair, and body. I do injest it orally sometime for overall health. My hair has grown considerably since using this oil along with my regimine, that I currently have for my hair. It also is used in a mask that I created for my skin, and it does not clog the pores. I love it and I think it is a good price and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing oil
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing without being too heavy. I have type 4a hair so keeping my hair well oiled is important. I make a homemade hot oil treatment with Shea butter, coconut oil with this grape seed oil and drops of Sage essential oil helps keep my hair moist and less frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Cozier

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, the best oil i have used on my face
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil. You can tell by the texture of it that’s 100% pure. This oil is now a daily skin regimen. I finally ordered a second bottle since May. Other brands i tried where extremely oily. There’s no scent which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Economical Pre-shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: Amazing the number of uses for this product. I'm using it as the pre-shave oil step of my double-edge shaving process. I appreciate the included pump dispenser. The oil has a light, pleasant smell. It's an excellent lubricant and moisturizer. It's also less expensive than the shaving products dedicated as a pre-shave oils. I'm very pleased with it's quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Roden

customer_reviews.title: BEST SELLER OF THIS OIL
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many grape seed oils from other brands and always felt like they weren't 100% true and authentic. Just by the feel and effects of this alone, my skin and critical thinking are telling me this is the best seller of the product
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great product with fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: The pumper works great, I mix this with a little organic sweet orange essential oil & rub this into spider veins on inside of knee area to help with this issue. I have recommended this to several of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: MRHB

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best thing made for people with dry skin and dry hair. I use this on my hands when I wear gloves as I wash dishes and they feel like velvet after. I use this on my hair as a natural deep conditioner and leave it for treatment. My hair comes out after a wash and rinse like super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pregnant belly!
customer_reviews.text: Loving the pump. The brand I had before had a regular top which was a bit messy. I use this all over my face/body religiously. I'm pregnant and can say I have absolutely no stretch marks. Good genes or the grapeseed oil? I don't know, but I'm going to just keep on using it!
customer_reviews.author: George's mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: This oil went bad after only using a 1/4 or so of it. I have another type that's much better and lasts a lot longer. The price is better and it's 16oz vs 8oz. It's from Majestic and Pure for the same price. . By the way it was stored properly.
customer_reviews.author: hollowleg911

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the grapeseed oil together with my leave in conditioner to add some texture and shine into my hair and its worked great so far.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBush

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grapeseed oil. It soaks into my skin nicely without making me feel oily; plus my skin stays hydrated for a while and I don't need to reapply as often as I do with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Savage

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I saw another blogger use this as a makeup remover and immediately ordered it. My skin is prone to breakouts but this is awesome! I put two pumps of the grapeseed oil in my hands and rub it all over my face. I then use a makeup remover wipe to remove the grapeseed oil. It melts my makeup right off without any harsh scrubbing. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Seeber

customer_reviews.title: ... this to use as a face moizturizer and I love it. It leaves my skin soft and not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a face moizturizer and I love it. It leaves my skin soft and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to make my own skincare products and was very pleased with my results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil to make my own skincare products and was very pleased with my results. It's a very pure product and organic, I have very dry skin and also mix with my moisturizer to keep my skin from drying out too much. This is an A+ in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Nd

customer_reviews.title: A must have in my home
customer_reviews.text: The pump is very convenient to reduce the chance of spilling. I use this to remove my makeup and it gets everything off! Great for your skin and heals small cuts, scrapes, irritation, etc..
customer_reviews.author: K.Adams

customer_reviews.title: This oil was recommend by a coworker for my scalp psoriasis and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil was recommend by a coworker for my scalp psoriasis and it works wonders on my scalp. Its light and airy and not heavy on the scalp and no build up or debris.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and I love how my skin feels using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Grapeseed Oil and this brand. I'm loving both! Great quality and I love how my skin feels using it. I use a few drops worth on my clean skin in the morning then use my moisturizer and I love the hydration that lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Doris T.

customer_reviews.title: When I first started using this oil my skin liked it, but for some reason it hasn't been ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this oil my skin liked it, but for some reason it hasn't been quite as moisturizing lately. I'm still figuring out how to mix it with other oils for my diy face and body oils, but as a massage oil this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The explanation label on the back of the bottle has ...
customer_reviews.text: The explanation label on the back of the bottle has a typo error in it. They didn't finish the statement about how its derived. Also its a little scary to be told its food grade but no where on the label does it say that. Why wouldn't you fix your label and market all its uses? I am somewhat sorry I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Very good oil!
customer_reviews.text: Grapeseed is the best in carrier oils. This is a very good quality oil and works well with all the oils I have tried it with. Very happy with this purchase, will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gayle West

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to get on cloths . Will stain
customer_reviews.text: This product came timely and well packaged. I know from past to be careful about grape seed excess on skin can stain cloths. Other then that I LOVE this nutrient dense oil!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helped with tendonitis.
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders for tendonitis. I have developed many soft tissue problems since an ankle break. I read where this had helped someone, so I thought I'd try it. I massage it into my ankle and foot each evening. The improvement was rapid. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: must have oil for the winter
customer_reviews.text: This oil really helped me seal the moisture in my hair in the winter time since my hair gets dry fast in the winter. This definitely is my go to oil has great shine and it mix well with my other oils i like to use in my hair which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Jay Why

customer_reviews.title: Cap Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Nice but the cap leaks after 2 uses. Everytime I need to use it the top gets messy and I have oil everywhere. The quality of the prpduct is good but the cap is a turnoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No more dry skin and no more bad reactions
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff as a daily face moisturizer. I have sensative skin and most moistrizers give me itchy skin but I have been using this product daily for over 2 years and could not be happier. My dry skin problems are forgotten.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Carey

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORGANIC
customer_reviews.text: The Company is called Sky ORGANICS but the oil is NOT ORGANIC. It is for my face so I wanted organic since grapes are super chemical layden.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Star

customer_reviews.title: It was actually recommended to help with hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using grapeseed oil. .It was actually recommended to help with hair growth. It was packaged perfectly and arrived on time as promised. My first time using was yesterday and so far I love how the product absorbs leaving my hair shiny but withour feeling greasy. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The secret to healthy skin
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering, because I enjoy everything about this product. I use it to make my own skincare cleaning and moisturizing formulas. It’s a tremendous help for aging skin, and for those like me, who will be exposed to the sun to some degree, it’s very healing.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Siter

customer_reviews.title: Not cold pressed, not organic
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere on this product does it say it's cold pressed as advertised on the website. Very deceptive. Also not organic despite the name.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Yost

customer_reviews.title: IT'S GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS OIL IS EXQUISITE. IT IS THE LIGHTEST OIL WHICH I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED. IT REMINDS ME OF DR. PERRICONE'S 'THE FIXER SOLID OIL.' ONE'S SKIN JUST GLISTENS AND LOOKS SO TIGHT. IT'S GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Oil works well, but pump leaks
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using this oil for massages, but whenever I leave it on the bedside table for a few days with the pump in the top, I find it sitting in a puddle of oil. We saved the other top, so I just switched out the pump for the original top and it has solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! There is only a faint smell if any at all. It moisturizes well and, for an oil, absorbs quickly. My only complaint is the pump didn't work, so I have to just use the regular top that came on the bottle. (The pump comes with it but was separate.) That's not a big deal, and I would still order this product - and from this company - again.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzsongster

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! it doesn't leave an oily residue and it has helped to improve the eczema on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product as soon as it was received. I liked the packaging (optional pump attached). This oil feels delightful on my skin and face. I've also used it in my hair but would not see the immediate benefits as it was added to other oils. Overall, this is one of my fav oils! Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Aitch

customer_reviews.title: I just started using the oil yesterday. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the oil yesterday. I had microblading done on my eyebrows which requires the use of grapeseed oil after the procedure. I searched for an organic product and found yours. Using an organic product is a big plus. Thank you for your follow-up.
customer_reviews.author: ND Casten

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil for using with my essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil for using with my essential oils! Great for the skin and to use on my children.
customer_reviews.author: Frank morris

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, nice and light soaks in well. I was looking forward to the pump on the bottle, as oil often makes the bottle slippery and gross, however mine arrived broken. Not worth sending back, but am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: joyce stephens

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Noticeable difference in skin softness and integrity. Doesn’t clog pores.

customer_reviews.title: Best product, Great Purchase! Light and non-greasy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful oil for light non greasy immediate moisturizing with no scent. LOVE IT!!

customer_reviews.title: Consistently high quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; I make my own lotions & potions 😊. This grape seed oil is great to work with; gives me a consistently high quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it to use in face and body creams - haven't made them yet. I have used the oil just as it is after showering and really liked it. Absorbed quickly and no odor. Nice large bottle that comes with a pump as well as a flip opener.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. Very good after shower moisturizer. Will purchase again

customer_reviews.title: a tiny bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: wish they had a glass bottle super slick - a tiny bit goes a long way light non-greasy takes time to absorb into skin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using to cleanse my acne prone skin and as a moisturizer. So far no problems!

customer_reviews.title: will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: perfect moisturizer for very dry skin . did not notice any change in dark circles under my eye but i know it may take some time to see changes. packaging was perfect . i wish if they reduce the price .

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend this Grapeseed oil
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend this Grapeseed oil. I have used it in some of my DIY projects, I mix about 5 drops with my conditioner, and also apply about 4-5 drops to my face. This does not leave your face or hair greasy at all, only soft.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my sensitive infants skin for massage and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my sensitive infants skin for massage and is safe when he puts his hands in his mouth afterwards. Like the pump option.

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle! Good for removing makeup or even for a moisturizer. Love it! Doesn’t clog my pores due to having extremely sensitive combo skin.

customer_reviews.text: I didn’t particularly notice a scent with this product. It is wonderful for massages and leaves my skin the most moisturized it has been in a long time!

product_meta.title: Grapeseed Oil by Sky Organics (8oz) 100% Pure, Natural & Cold-Pressed Grapeseed Oil - Ideal for Massage, Cooking and Aromatherapy- Rich in Vitamin A, E and K- Helps Reduce Wrinkles
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 8 fl oz. bottle of Grapeseed Oil by Sky Organics
100% Pure and Cold-pressed: Sky Organics Grapeseed Oil is 100% pure, natural, and cold-pressed so you get all of its skin-loving benefits!

Natural Source of Antioxidants: A natural source of vitamin E and fatty acids, our light and silky Grapeseed Oil moisturizes skin, giving it a nourished and healthy-looking appearance – without feeling greasy.
Multipurpose Beauty Essential: Use Sky Organics Grapeseed Oil in your beauty routine as a moisturizing face oil for all skin types, a lightweight body oil, or in DIY beauty and hair recipes.
Responsibly Made: Sky Organics Grapeseed Oil is responsibly sourced and is 100% vegan and cruelty-free.
